title: Portfolio
description: A 3D journey through code. Each section unfolds via unique vehicles, turning standard scrolling into an immersive exploration. High performance, game-inspired UX, zero friction.

title: Space Pirates
description: A tactical RPG where space exploration meets seamless Web3 ownership. Deep squad building and cartoon-style combat, powered by a hidden blockchain layer for a frictionless, player-led economy.

title: Survivor.Io Sniping Bot
description: A Python-based assistant for high-speed game auctions. Leveraging OCR and Regex for real-time data extraction, it calculates instant ROI, turning complex probability into a decisive competitive edge.

title: Survivor.Io Event Tool
description: A viral pathfinding tool with 750k+ views. Using backtracking to optimize rewards, it disrupted the gameâ€™s economy so effectively that developers introduced a paid feature to counter its impact.

title: Crypto Price Tracker
description: A React-based crypto tracker featuring infinite scroll and real-time data validation via CoinGecko API. It delivers a fluid UX with interactive candlestick charting powered by amCharts 5 engines.

title: Color Screen Test
description: A React Native utility for display testing. Featuring RGB control and presets to detect burn-in, it bypasses Android native themes for pure color accuracy and hardware-level visual comparisons.

title: Meta Empire
description: High-security NFT smart contract featuring Dutch Auctions and Merkle Tree whitelists. Optimized for gas efficiency with a 100% test coverage suite (900+ lines), ensuring robust, audit-ready code.

title: Wallet Tracker
description: A cross-chain DeFi portfolio tracker. It aggregates native and ERC20 balances across multiple EVM chains (ETH, BSC, Polygon, etc.) via direct contract queries and CoinMarketCap data integration.

title: Plan It
description: A smart calendar architected through rigorous software engineering. Using UML modeling and euristic-based scheduling logic, it manages complex multi-user constraints and priority-based tasking.

title: Smart Parking App
description: A Smart Parking solution focused on HCI. Based on user interviews and field research, it optimizes campus logistics via computer vision, slot reservations, and a community-driven reporting system.

title: Hotel Meano
description: A hotel booking platform featuring a custom 3D interactive floor map. Built with a focus on UI/UX, it allows real-time room selection and status visualization through a dynamic CSS-based 3D engine.

title: Flynet
description: A Java-based airport management system. Beyond core CRUD features for flight scheduling, it features a custom CSS parallax Hero section with dynamic cloud layers and a takeoff animation on scroll.
